def get_b(s):
    b = []
    for i in range(len(s)):
        b.append(sum([abs(i-j) for j in range(len(s)) if s[j] > s[i]]))
    return b

def get_s(b):
    s = ''
    for i in range(len(b)):
        s += chr(ord('a')+i)
    return s

def get_t(s, b):
    t = ''
    for i in range(len(b)):
        t += s[b[i]]
    return t
